With reference to the Bathukamma festival celebrated in late September, consider the following statements:
  1. It is a festival of Tamil Nadu.
  2. It is to celebrate the monsoon.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: It is the state festival of Telangana. It is also celebrated in some parts of Andhra Pradesh. It is celebrated every year by the stateâ€™s women. It is generally celebrated during the September to October period. Statement 2 is incorrect: It is a festival of flowers. It is celebrated as Bathukamma meaning the mother goddess comes alive. It is celebrated during the Telugu Badhrapada Amavasya of the Hindu calendar. The festival involves arrangement of seasonal flowers, many of which are of medicinal value.
